page.description: Renders the data in a TransForm form using a TransForm form definition as the template. By default the same Form definition used to collect the data is used.

argument.name: formInstanceid
argument.description: The formInstanceId of the form data you wish to render as HTML

argument.name: formName
argument.description: The form id of the form you want to use as the template for the HTML. If you do not specify a value the same form definition as was used to collect the data is used.

return.name: JSON Object
return.description: Returns an object with these properties:

section.title: Node
Xbasic
section.example: dim apikey as c = "Your_api_key" dim postdata as c dim url as c = "" dim pr as p pr = a5dialogHelper_transformAPIQuery(url,postdata,apikey) if pr.error = .f. then dim result as c result = pr.result else dim errorText as c errorText = pr.errorText end if
